quests.title: Warrior initiation
quests.summary: Revisit the origins of Rostam and his bond with Rakhsh before stepping into quests.

quests.title: Seven Labours quickfire
quests.summary: Relive the pivotal trials from Mazandaran in a rapid-fire lore sprint.

quests.title: Court strategist
quests.summary: Untangle alliances across the Shahnameh court to reinforce diplomatic instincts.

steps.headline: The dawn of Rostam
body: Rostam, born to Zāl and Rudabeh, is the mightiest champion of Zabul and the anchor of Iranian resistance.
From his earliest days, the Simurgh guided his lineage and destiny toward safeguarding the realm.

steps.question: How does Rostam recognise the steed Rakhsh as his true companion?
context: Among countless colts, only one stood unbroken and bold enough to match the hero's spirit.

options.label: He draws lots among the royal stables
options.feedback: Luck never forged their bond — Rakhsh chose Rostam as much as Rostam chose him.

options.label: He tests each horse, and only one endures his weight and speed
options.feedback: Correct — Rakhsh endures Rostam's trial, proving their fates are entwined.

options.label: The Simurgh delivers the steed as a gift
options.feedback: The Simurgh shapes the family’s destiny, but Rostam earns Rakhsh through discernment.

steps.headline: Foreshadowing the White Demon
body: The trials ahead in Mazandaran demand not only strength but insight into the unseen machinations of divs.
Rostam prepares, knowing that each victory fortifies the Shahnameh's living ledger.

completion.message: Initiation complete — Rostam's path is clear for the next quest.

steps.headline: Into Mazandaran
body: The Seven Labours carry Rostam through deserts, mountains, and the lairs of cunning divs.
Each labour sharpens his resolve and the legend tracked by every REAL Shahnameh chronicle.

steps.prompt: Tap each labour in the order Rostam conquers them to restore the Mazandaran timeline.
steps.progressMessage: Good — the legend is aligning. Keep tapping in order.
steps.resetMessage: The saga fragments — start the sequence again to restore the lore.
steps.successMessage: Timeline restored. Rostam's victories surge through the REAL ledger.

steps.question: Who heals Kay Kāvus and his warriors after Rostam defeats the White Demon?

options.label: Rostam himself
options.feedback: Rostam fights relentlessly, but healing comes through another ally.

options.label: The Simurgh
options.feedback: Correct — the Simurgh's feathers restore the blinded heroes to strength.
options.rewardLabel: Quiz mastered · Simurgh heals the court

options.label: Tahmineh
options.feedback: Tahmineh's role is vital later, but not in Mazandaran's recovery.

completion.message: Mazandaran stands recorded — the Seven Labours pulse within the REAL chronicle.

steps.headline: Signals from the court
body: Diplomatic ripples cross the Shahnameh as rulers balance alliances with looming threats.
Reading intent is as critical as wielding strength.

steps.question: Which ruler seeks Rostam's aid to reclaim Mazandaran after falling to the Divs?

options.label: Kay Kāvus
options.feedback: Correct — Kay Kāvus calls upon Rostam to break the Divs' hold on Mazandaran.

options.label: Zahhāk
options.feedback: Zahhāk is an ancient tyrant opposed by the heroes, not a petitioner.

options.label: Gudarz
options.feedback: Gudarz stands among the Iranian commanders but does not send the plea himself.

steps.prompt: Match the sequence of counsel Rostam receives before marching.
steps.resetMessage: The court falls into disarray. Re-evaluate the counsel order.
steps.successMessage: Strategy aligned. Rostam advances with clarity.

completion.message: Diplomatic instincts sharpened — the court looks to you for the next guidance.
